stepBody: First, you need to identify the two curves that define the region whose area you want to find. In this case, f(x) is the upper curve and g(x) is the lower curve. Note that from $$0$$ to $$\frac{\pi}{4}$$, the graph g(x) is an upper curve. But from $$\frac{\pi}{4}$$ to pi, f(x) is an upper curve and g(x) is a lower curve.##figure1.gif##
